definition: to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
lit. mysteries of heaven must not be revealed (idiom); must not be revealed/I am not at liberty to inform you.
pinyin: tian1 ji1 bu4 ke3 xie4 lu4

definition: to divulge the will of heaven (idiom); to leak a secret/to let the cat out of the bag

sentences.english: It was butane vapor, leaking from a corroded steel pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 那是從腐蝕的鋼製石油管道中泄露的丁烷蒸汽。

sentences.english: And no information whatsoever goes out.
sentences.chinese: 沒有任何信息會泄露出來。

sentences.english: Soft pliable lid provides leak resistant seal.
sentences.chinese: 柔軟蓋板，蓋合嚴實不泄露。

sentences.english: More than 500 sea turtles died in the spill area.
sentences.chinese: 據統計，在泄露海域有超過500只海龜死亡。

sentences.english: His insincerity is revealed by the quick goggle of his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他眼睛的快速轉動泄露了他的不誠。

sentences.english: They were forced to suspend their espionage activities after their identities were compromised.
sentences.chinese: 在身份泄露後，他們被迫擱置了自己的間諜活動。

sentences.english: You can also control excess reactivity by leakage.
sentences.chinese: 你也能通過泄露控制剩餘反應性。

sentences.english: He denied that he had leaked these information to Barret.
sentences.chinese: 他否認曾把這些情報泄露給巴雷特。

sentences.english: You're the one blabbing to the entire family.
sentences.chinese: 是你把祕密泄露給全家人的。

sentences.english: Bubbles-tight sealing with no leakage under the pressure test.
sentences.chinese: 達到完全密封，氣體試驗泄露爲零。

sentences.english: Don't let on about our arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 別把我們的安排泄露出去。

sentences.english: Any leak would have ruined the entire mission.
sentences.chinese: 只要當中任何一個人泄露，整個任務就會功虧一簣。

sentences.english: We have production equals absorption plus leakage.
sentences.chinese: 我們有生產等於吸收加上泄露。
馬丁在閒談中泄露了自己的祕密。

sentences.english: Since heat leak is always present, vaporization takes place continuously in smaller containers.
sentences.chinese: 由於熱泄露總是存在，在小容器裏蒸發不斷地發生。

definition: (of a liquid or gas) to leak/to divulge (a secret)/to leak
to leak (of information, liquid etc)/to divulge
to keep sth confidential/to maintain secrecy
to expose/to reveal/to lay bare/also pr. [pu4 lu4]
to steal (including identity theft, credit card fraud or theft of computer account)/to misappropriate
to conceal/to hide (a taboo subject)/to cover up the truth
to make known to the masses (idiom); to publicize widely/to let the world know
